data.name: DeleteProduct
Get
data.value: select p.[Name] as 'Name', isnull(i.[Quantity], 0) as 'Quantity', replace(rtrim(replace(convert(varchar(50), p.[CreatedOn], 126),'0',' ')),' ','0') as 'CreatedOn' from dbo.Product p left outer join dbo.ProductInventory i on p.ProductId = i.ProductId for json path;

data.name: GetByName
data.value: select p.[Name] as 'Name', isnull(i.[Quantity], 0) as 'Quantity', replace(rtrim(replace(convert(varchar(50), p.[CreatedOn], 126),'0',' ')),' ','0') as 'CreatedOn' from dbo.Product p left outer join dbo.ProductInventory i on p.ProductId = i.ProductId where p.[Name] = '<@Name>' for json path;

data.name: GetFirstProduct
data.value: select top 1 p.[Name] from dbo.Product p;

data.name: GetHighestQuantity
GetLastProduct
data.value: select top 1 p.[Name] from dbo.Product p inner join dbo.ProductInventory i on p.[ProductId] = i.[ProductId] order by p.[CreatedOn] desc;

data.name: GetLowestQuantity
GetNewest
data.value:
declare @max datetime2 = (select max([CreatedOn]) from [dbo].[Product]);
select p.[Name] as 'Name', isnull(i.[Quantity], 0) as 'Quantity', replace(rtrim(replace(convert(varchar(50), p.[CreatedOn], 126),'0',' ')),' ','0') as 'CreatedOn' from dbo.Product p left outer join dbo.ProductInventory i on p.ProductId = i.ProductId where p.[CreatedOn] = @max for json path;

data.name: GetOldest
data.value:
declare @min datetime2 = (select min([CreatedOn]) from [dbo].[Product]);
select p.[Name] as 'Name', isnull(i.[Quantity], 0) as 'Quantity', replace(rtrim(replace(convert(varchar(50), p.[CreatedOn], 126),'0',' ')),' ','0') as 'CreatedOn' from dbo.Product p left outer join dbo.ProductInventory i on p.ProductId = i.ProductId where p.[CreatedOn] = @min for json path;

data.name: InsertProduct
